data.title: Fly PVD - Rhode Island T. F. Green International Airport
data.meta_description: Fly hassle-free from Rhode Island T.F. Green International Airport (PVD) in Providence, RI. Your gateway to convenient and comfortable travel.
data.meta_site_name: Rhode Island T. F. Green International Airport | PVD
data.text:
Dunkin’

The world’s largest coffee and donut shop

4:00 AM to 7:00 PM

Providence Provisions

A classic Rhode Island gastropub where everyone is welcome

5:00 AM to 7:00 PM

Wolfgang Puck Express

Wolfgang Puck Express offers the chef’s signature cuisine

Monday – Friday: 5:00 AM – 7:00 PM Saturday – Sunday: 11:00 AM – 7:00 PM

Whalers Rhode Island Bar

Serving Rhode Island’s favorite line of beers fresh from the tap

11:00 AM – Last Departure

Bellevue Essentials

The store’s name pays tribute to Bellevue Avenue, located in Newport, RI; which is the home to the famous mansions.

4:00 AM to 7:45 PM

Gineva Murano Glass Jewelry

Family owned, locally designed and crafted jewelry

8:00 AM – 4:00 PM

Escape Lounge

Guests entering the Escape Lounge will receive unlimited amenities

6:00 AM to 7:00 PM

Military Lounge

Available to all members of the military and their families

10:00 AM to 7:00 PM

Ready Card

Located across from the United Airlines ticket counters

Always Open

Hope Reflection Room

The Reflection Room is a place of serenity and respite for the traveler

Always Open

ATMs – Citizens Bank

ATMs are available at multiple locations inside the terminal

Always Open

Service Animal Relief Area

For those who travel with service animals

Always Open

Free Wi-Fi

The airport provides free wireless service through Boingo Wireless

Always Open

Nursing Rooms

The Nursing Rooms at PVD are pleasant

Always Open

Dunkin’

The world’s largest coffee and donut shop

4:00 AM to Last Departure

Rhode Island Burger Company

Burger, fries, chicken, chili, salad, and more!

11:00 AM – Last Departure

Conference Room Rental

Maximize your time and have your meeting at the airport

8:30 AM – 4:00 PM, Monday – Friday

Saugy Franks

A Rhode Island favorite – locally made hot dogs since 1869.

4:00 AM to Last Departure

Illy Coffee Machines

illycaffè is an Italian family business founded in 1933 and is renowned around the world

Always Open

CLEAR

CLEAR Plus gets you to your gate faster using your eyes or fingerprints to verify you are you at airport security.

4:00 AM to 7:00 PM

Napatree Marketplace

The store’s name pays tribute to Napatree Point, located in the Watch Hill District of Westerly, RI.

4:00 AM to 7:45 PM

No Boundaries/ ’47

Construction Update

6:00 AM to 7:00 PM
